## Goal of the analysis

Visualizing SARS CoV2-N1,N2 in manhole samples till 7-April-22

## Linear plot 

Y axis in units of copies per litre of WW

```{r all_plot}

pltbox

plotly::ggplotly(pltbox, dynamicTicks = TRUE)

```


## Log scale y axis

```{r copiesrna}

pltbox_logy <- pltbox %>% 
  format_logscale_y() %>% 
  print()

plotly::ggplotly(pltbox_logy, dynamicTicks = TRUE)

```
